strapiPost.title: Arkansas Mens Red-White Game
strapiPost.content:
ICYMI - The Arkansas Razorbacks Men Basketball team had their annual Red-White game last night at Bud Walton Arena in Fayetteville, AR

  • Students were the only spectators allowed in the game (maxing out at 4,000), but the game was live streamed on SEC Network
  • Deep Dive - For you sports nerds out there, more information about the actual game can be found HERE
